reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://acc-test.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Menu' link to show the navigation menu items.
Click the 'Configuration' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' link.
Check if the 'Connect to MPX' button is present. If not then MPX has not been previously enabled.
Enter mpx username in the 'Username for New Account' text box.
Enter mpx password in the 'Password for New Account' text box.
Click the 'Connect to MPX' button.
Select 'DB TV' from the first 'Select Import Account for...' drop down list.
click the 'Set Import Account' button.
Click the 'Save configurations' button.
Click the 'Menu' link to show the navigation menu items.
Click the 'Menu' link to show the navigation menu items.
Click the 'Content' menu link.
Click the primary nav 'Files' link.
Click the secondary nav 'mpxMedia'.
Select 'AutomationPlayer1' from the first 'Import Player' drop down list.
Click the 'Sync MPX Media Now' link.
Click the 'Menu' link to show the navigation menu items.
Click the 'Menu' link to show the navigation menu items.
Click the 'Configuration' menu link.
Click the 'Cron' link.
Click the 'Run Cron' button.

Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' link.
Get all the selected import account options and store to a list.
Click the 'ACCOUNT LIST' link.
Wait for 'Delete Account' button to be visible.
Get each of the 'Delete Account' buttons
Get each of the 'Delete Account' buttons
Get each of the 'Delete Account' buttons
Verify the text 'You are about to delete account' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'and all of its assets. This action cannot be undone.' is present on the page.
Click the 'Delete' button.
Get each of the 'Delete Account' buttons
Click the 'Content' menu link.
Click the primary nav 'Files' link.
Click the secondary nav 'mpxMedia'.
Enter title Automation.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Verify there are no search results present.
Click the 'Configuration' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' link.
Enter mpx username in the 'Username for New Account' text box.
Enter mpx password in the 'Password for New Account' text box.
Click the 'Connect to MPX' button.
Verify success message of 'Login successful' is present.
Select 'DB TV' from the first 'Select Import Account for...' drop down list.
click the 'Set Import Account' button.
Verify success message of 'Setting import account "DB%20TV" for account' is present.
Click the 'Save configurations' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Content' menu link.
Click the primary nav 'Files' link.
Click the secondary nav 'mpxMedia'.
Select 'AutomationPlayer1' from the first 'Import Player' drop down list.
